title: A. Michael West: Advancing human-robot interactions in health care
summary: A. Michael West, a mechanical engineering PhD candidate at MIT, shares how he stumbled into his career path and found his passion for research through the MIT Summer Research Program (MSRP). MSRP provided him with the confidence and validation to pursue graduate studies and succeed in academia. West's current research focuses on understanding human movement to develop better rehabilitation devices. He has also been involved in mentoring and leadership roles to give back to the community. West has received prestigious fellowships and will be joining the MIT and Accenture Convergence Initiative for Industry and Technology. Despite his accomplishments, West remains laid-back and emphasizes the importance of asking for help and learning from others.
